pages.title: Durability
pages.text: Tool durabilities have been modified from their vanilla values. $(item)Wooden/$ and $(item)Stone/$ tools have reduced durability, while all other tools have increased durability.

Because $(item)Diamond Tools/$ (now called $(item)Adamantine/$) are available later than in vanilla, an additional tier of $(item)Brass tools/$ has been added between $(item)Iron/$ and $(item)Diamond/$ (now called $(item)Adamantine/$). Tools made of &(item)Brass/$ have the same mining level as $(item)Diamond/$ in vanilla.
$(item)Diamond Tools/$ are now made from $(item)Adamantine Ingots/$, which requires $(concept)Crushing/$ the $(item)Diamonds/$ to be combined with $(item)Iron Ingots/$.
$(item)Netherite/$, now known as $(item)Steel/$, can be made in a $(concept)Superheated Mixer/$ by combining $(item)Ancient Scrap/$ with $(item)Iron/$.
